entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
